Harris unveils plan for 28% capital gains tax, softening Biden's proposal for 40% rate … Vice President Kamala Harris on Wednesday proposed a 28% tax on long-term capital gains for households with an annual income of $1 million or more, lower than the 39.6% rate President Joe Biden laid out in his 2025 fiscal year budget.
